name: rent_nft
attributes: # [doc = " NFT を一旦貸し出し用プールに移動し、借り手の使用料残高を増やします"]
body: let cpi_accounts = Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . owner_token . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . pool_token . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . owner . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts ,) ;
let prev = ctx . accounts . renter_account . balance ;
ctx . accounts . renter_account . balance = prev . checked_add (fee) . unwrap () ;
msg ! ("NFT rented: prev fee {} -> new fee {} for {}" , prev , ctx . accounts . renter_account . balance , ctx . accounts . renter . key ()) ;

fields.name: owner_token
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT 貸し出し元のトークン口座"] # [account (mut , constraint = owner_token . mint == nft_mint . key ())]

fields.name: pool_token
fields.attribute: # [doc = " プール保管用のトークン口座"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: nft_mint
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 貸し出し対象の NFT ミント"]

fields.name: renter
fields.attribute: # [doc = " プログラムに渡された借り手"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT 保有者（owner として振る舞うがチェックなし）"]
